abstract: Ms. Sevigny, the "Big Love" and "Boys Don't Cry" star, will play a hired assassin and a pre-op transsexual who learns she has a son, on a new DirecTV series called "Hit and Miss."
snippet: Ms. Sevigny, the "Big Love" and "Boys Don't Cry" star, will play a hired assassin and a pre-op transsexual who learns she has a son, on a new DirecTV series called "Hit and Miss."

headline.main: Chloë Sevigny Has, What Else, More Secrets in a New Television Series
headline.print_headline: A New Series, and Secrets, For Chloë Sevigny Next Year
